scripts.stack:ui: docker compose --profile ui up -d --build db rag-api web
scripts.stack:nuke: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -a --volumes --force
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose run --rm --no-deps rag-api alembic upgrade head
scripts.admin:bootstrap: docker compose run --rm --no-deps rag-api python scripts/create_admin.py
scripts.contracts:export: docker compose run --rm rag-api python scripts/export_openapi.py --out /repo/shared/contracts/openapi.json
scripts.test:backend:unit: docker compose run --rm --no-deps --build rag-api pytest -m unit
scripts.e2e: pnpm run e2e:install && pnpm -C tests/e2e exec playwright test
scripts.e2e:ui: pnpm run e2e:install && pnpm -C tests/e2e test:ui
